variables.name: mTransportType
variables.comment: The transport type of the data connection

variables.name: mId
variables.comment:
* The unique ID of the data connection. This is the id assigned in
         * {@link DataCallResponse)}.

variables.name: mNetworkAgentId
variables.comment: * The current TelephonyNetworkAgent ID. {@code -1} if no network agent.

variables.name: mState
variables.comment: The state of the data connection

variables.name: mNetworkType
variables.comment: The network type associated with this data connection

variables.name: mLinkProperties
variables.comment: If the data connection is connected, the properties of the connection

variables.name: mFailCause
variables.comment:
* In case a procedure related to this data connection fails, a non-zero error code
         * indicating the cause of the failure.

variables.name: mApnSetting
variables.comment: The APN Setting for this data connection

variables.name: mDefaultQos
variables.comment: The Default QoS for this EPS/5GS bearer or null otherwise

variables.name: mNetworkValidationStatus
variables.comment: The network validation status for the data connection.

methods.name: public Builder setTransportType(@TransportType int transportType)
methods.comment:
* Set the transport type of the data connection.
         *
         * @param transportType The transport type of the data connection
         * @return The builder

methods.name: public Builder setId(int id)
methods.comment:
* Set the id of the data connection.
         *
         * @param id The id of the data connection
         * @return The builder

methods.name: public Builder setNetworkAgentId(int agentId)
methods.comment:
* Set the id of the data connection.
         *
         * @param agentId The id of the data connection
         * @return The builder

methods.name: public Builder setState(@DataState int state)
methods.comment:
* Set the state of the data connection.
         *
         * @param state The state of the data connection
         * @return The builder

methods.name: public Builder setNetworkType(@NetworkType int networkType)
methods.comment:
* Set the network type associated with this data connection.
         *
         * @param networkType The network type
         * @return The builder

methods.name: public Builder setLinkProperties(LinkProperties linkProperties)
methods.comment:
* Set the link properties of the connection.
         *
         * @param linkProperties Link properties
         * @return The builder

methods.name: public Builder setFailCause(@DataFailureCause int failCause)
methods.comment:
* Set the fail cause of the data connection.
         *
         * @param failCause In case a procedure related to this data connection fails, a non-zero
         * error code indicating the cause of the failure.
         * @return The builder

methods.name: public Builder setApnSetting(@NonNull ApnSetting apnSetting)
methods.comment:
* Set the APN Setting for this data connection.
         *
         * @param apnSetting APN setting
         * @return This builder

methods.name: public Builder setDefaultQos(@Nullable Qos qos)
methods.comment:
* Set the default QoS for this data connection.
         *
         * @param qos The qos information, if any, associated with the default bearer of the
         * data connection.
         * @return The builder
         * @hide

methods.name: public Builder setNetworkValidationStatus(@NetworkValidationStatus int networkValidationStatus)
methods.comment:
* Set the network validation state for the data connection.
         *
         * @param networkValidationStatus the network validation status of the data call
         * @return The builder

methods.name: public PreciseDataConnectionState build()
methods.comment:
* Build the {@link PreciseDataConnectionState} instance.
         *
         * @return The {@link PreciseDataConnectionState} instance
